message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14000. It's a great deal for you, as it's worth $15000 to you. I'm confident it will be a valuable asset to you. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12500. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our prices. What do you think?

Bob, I appreciate your interest and your offer.  While $12500 is closer to my desired price, I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to come down to $13500. It's a fair price, considering the value of the product to you.  Let's meet in the middle.
I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $13000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at this price?
